div.p: Spatial correlation of reconstructed temperature time series of East Antarctica (1958–1981, 2 years lag) with mean Sept-Oct-Nov ( a) ERA 40 Reanalysis surface air temperature (at 2 m height) and ( b) NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis SST. Spatial correlation of reconstructed temperature time series of West Antarctica (1959–1983, 2 years lag) with mean Sept-Oct-Nov ( c) surface air temperature (at 2 m height) from ERA 40 and ( d) NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis SST. The regions of significant spatial correlations (at 90% significance level) are highlighted in colour band. This plot was generated using Climate Reanalyzer ( http://cci-reanalyzer.org), Climate Change Institute, University of Maine, USA.
